description: Unique identifier for this job title assignment record; primary key generated by the system.
Datetime the record was created or last updated (likely UTC); used for audit and synchronization; confirm format with SME.
Identifier of the assigned job title/position, likely referencing a job title lookup; foreign key; confirm relation with SME.
Name of the referenced entity for the job title foreign key (polymorphic reference; confirm behavior with SME).
Identifier of the employee holding the title; foreign key to employee master record.
Name of the referenced entity for the employee foreign key (polymorphic reference; confirm behavior with SME).
Legacy systemâ€™s original record ID for this assignment; retained for traceability and data reconciliation.
Name of the source table in the legacy system from which this record originated.
Date the job title assignment ended; blank or null indicates active/current assignment; confirm end-date inclusivity with SME.
Date the job title assignment began; used to determine effective period of the role.
